Knowing that in Italy the fixed telephone numbers have 10 digits whose the first is 0, how many numbers can we have?
The distance between two numbers in the Fibonacci sequence is 2 places. What is the quotient of the two numbers?
The perimeter proportion of two homothetic polygons equals 5. How many times is the area of the first polygon greater than the area of the second polygon?
If the first three Fibonacci numbers are given as 1, 1, 2 then what is the eleventh number?
It is known that 21% of the amount of milk is cream and 25% of the amount of cream is butter. Find out the amount of milk we need to obtain 52,5 kg butter?

How many mL of a 0.48 M NaOH solution are needed to neutralize 100 mL of a 0.12 M HCl solution?

What is another word for “centre of mass”?
